Description: Ash-Sharqiyah Development Co (known as: Sharqiya Dev Co) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Sharqiya Dev Co operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Agricultural Products. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Packaged Foods and Meats and Agricultural Products. Sharqiya Dev Co is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 1986.
